textBeforeTable: What documents required to be brought by Customer to complete Simas.net Registration ?   Back to top Complete all available data. • Follow all the existing steps. • Select Registration at column Simas.net. • Access www.sinarmassekuritas.co.id • How is to register Simas.net ?   Back to top Simas.net suggests to change Password and PIN of Trading for security of client’s account. • Simas.Net will deliver: - confirmation through e-mail for every transaction already made. • Fund of client is safe because instruction of fund transfer to the bank account or stock transfer to other broker is only delivered to the name of the same account. • For security in the whole, Simas.net has performed security assessment conducted by the third party who is experience in its field. An audit covers technical and operational aspects, such as security policy, procedure and etcetera. •
